<title level="1" right="Spell 8" pfs="Standard">[Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** unlimited

**Target** 1 creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You learn the name of the target's exact location (including the building, community, and country) and plane of existence.

 You can target a creature only if you've seen it in person, have one of its significant belongings, or have a piece of its body. To target an object, you must have touched it or have a fragment of it. _Discern location_ automatically overcomes protections against [detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=43) and [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) of lower level than this spell, even if they would normally have a chance to block it.
name: Discern Location
